description: Completion of short tasks including quizzes, brief activities, worksheets, and online tutorials to prepare for tutorials and major assessments. Includes 4 online tutorials and scaffolded tasks.

Recorded presentation pitching a research design for a specific topic. Includes rationale, experimental design justification, operationalisation of variables, study aims/hypotheses. Forms basis for Research Proposal assessment.

Written proposal with literature review, methodology, predicted results analysis (using provided dummy data), data visualisation, and discussion. Includes data wrangling worksheet component (Part B). Adheres to APA style guidelines.
Online multiple-choice exam covering all course content (lectures and tutorials). Consists of 80 questions testing research methods and statistical concepts.
